sentences.en: A similar situation prevails in Canada.
sentences.cn: 同样的情况在加拿大也普遍存在。

sentences.en: Can you prevail on him to go?
Can't I prevail upon you to have another helping of pie?
sentences.cn: 你再吃一块馅饼好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Faith that justice would prevail impelled us forward.
sentences.cn: 正义必胜的信念激励着我们前进.

sentences.en: He could not prevail with her, however hard he tried.
sentences.cn: 无论他如何努力都无法说服她.

sentences.en: He is easy to prevail upon [ with ].
sentences.cn: 他是容易 说服 的.

sentences.en: May I prevail on you to make a speech after dinner?
sentences.cn: 可以请你在用餐后讲几句话 吗 ?

sentences.en: Political and personal ambitions are starting to prevail over economic interests.
sentences.cn: 政治抱负和个人野心开始压倒经济利益。

sentences.en: Presidents, by nature , desire to prevail.
sentences.cn: 总统的本性都是唯我独尊.

sentences.en: Pretentious literary style does not prevail now.
sentences.cn: 矫揉造作的文体现在已经不时兴了.

sentences.en: Rick still believes that justice will prevail.
sentences.cn: 里克仍然相信正义会得以伸张。

sentences.en: The Data Processing analysis is likely to prevail in the long run.
sentences.cn: 从长远角度看,"数据加工"案的分析很可能起主导作用.

sentences.en: We'll try to prevail on him to accept the invitation.
sentences.cn: 我们将尽力说服他接受邀请.

sentences.en: Why should it prevail against natural selection?
sentences.cn: 它为什么要阻止自然选择 呢 ?

sentences.en: Will, when looking well can't move her, looking ill prevail?
sentences.cn: 难道, 当健康不能将她打动, 憔悴会让她转心肠?

sentences.en: You may prevail upon your friend to lend you & 10.
sentences.cn: 你可以劝朋友借给你10 镑 钱.

sentences.en: 英文编辑：the economic conditions which prevail in England and Wales
sentences.cn: 英格兰和威尔士普遍的经济状况

words.tran_cn: 流行的；一般的，最普通的；占优势的；盛行很广的
盛行，流行（prevail的现在分词形式）；获胜
劝说,劝导,刺激;施加压力

trans.tran_cn: 流行，盛行，被接受，战胜，说服，劝说
trans.tran_en: if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time
if a belief, custom, situation etc prevails, it exists among a group of people at a certain time
